hero: Síse ìwùnílórí fún àwon olùse ìpinlè ohun tó seyebíye

reblog_modal_content: Ipolowo yii yoo han loju kikọ sii ara rẹ. Iṣẹ yii ko le ṣe ifilọlẹ.
transfer_modal_info: Tẹ bọtini ti o wa ni isalẹ lati darí si SteemConnect lati pari iṣeduro rẹ.
to_error_not_found_username: Ko le wa olumulo pẹlu orukọ {orukọ olumulo}.

amount_error_format: Iwọn ti ko tọ. Lo aami bii iyọtọ decimal ati ni ipo 3 decimal pupọ.
amount_error_zero: Iye ni lati wa ga ju 0 lọ.
memo_placeholder: Afikun ifiranṣẹ lati ni ninu sisanwo (aṣayan)
profile_name_placeholder: Name to display on your profile
profile_social_profile_incorrect: This doesn't seem to be valid username. Only alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores and dots are allowed.
voting_power_info: Ole ṣeki agbara fifun Awọn Idibo lati pato pato idiyele ti agbara agbara rẹ lati lo fun bii.
vote_percent_info: Ole yan iye aiyipada rẹ aiyipada. O yoo lo bi iye aiyipada ni idiyele idibo ati bi iye ti a lo fun idibo nigbati idije idibo jẹ alaabo.
language_info: Iru ede wo ni o fẹ lo lori Busy?
discover_more_people_info: Ṣawarijulọ olokiki awọn olumulo ti yi Syeed
invite_info: Awọn tuntun loriboard lori Busy.org loni lilo ọna asopọ ni isalẹ ki o gba 10% awọn ere wọn fun ọjọ 30.
invite_share: Join me today on busy.org and get rewarded to blog {link}
more_people_not_found: A ko ri awọn eniyan diẹ sii
trending_topics: Awọn nkan ti o ṣe aṣa
top_reblogged_users: Awọn olumulo ti o ni Agbegbe ti o Top
select_or_past_image: Yan aworan tabi lẹẹ mọọ lati igbasilẹ.
title: Akọle
title_error_too_long: Akọle ko le jẹ gun ju awọn ohun kikọ 255 lọ.
topics_extra: Pa awọn ero pẹlu aami idẹsẹ. Awọn lẹta kekere kekere, awọn nọmba ati iwa irufẹ jẹ idasilẹ.
topics_error_count: O ni lati fi awọn koko 1 si 5 kun.
story_error_empty: Ọrọ akoonu ko le jẹ ofo.
quick_post_error_empty_title: Akọle ti akọle ko le jẹ ẹmu.
get_boost_content: Ṣe afẹfẹ lati ṣe igbelaruge ipolowo rẹ? Fi ọrọ naa kun "o nšišẹ (busy)" ati ki o gba irufẹ lati ọdọ wa.
drafts_empty: O ko ni eyikeyi igbalaaye ti a fipamọ
drafts_description: Awon wọnyi ni awọn lẹta ti a ko ṣe ni gbangba. O le ṣe atejade wọn tabi pa wọn.
draft_delete_modal_content: Njẹda ọ loju pe o fẹ pa osere yi patapata?

page_not_found_message: Odara! O dabi pe o tẹle ọna asopọ buburu kan.
page_forbidden_message: Odara! O dabi pe o nilo lati buwolu wọle lati lo oju-ewe yii.

display_nsfw_posts_details: Ole ṣeki gbogbo awọn posts ti a tagged pẹlu NSFW lati han bi aiyipada.

post_preview_hidden_for_nsfw: Ayẹwo abajade yii ni a ti faramọ nisisiyi nitori pe NSFW ti wa ni tag.
